title: Replace 'capitalism' with 'market economy'.
description:
I think it should be discussed whether to replace the word 'capitalism' with the more generic but descriptive term 'market economy'. Because IIRC '[capitalism](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Capitalism)' refers to a _specific type_ of market-based economy where most capital is privately owned, but other economic models that still retain the market mechanism do exist (eg. [market socialism](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Market_socialism)). So making the implicit assumption that 'market-based economy' necessarily equals 'capitalism' could be misleading.

(disclaimer: I am not an economist.)
